name: io.github.bromoket/x64dbg
description: 152-tool MCP server for the x64dbg debugger. AI-powered debugging, disassembly, breakpoints, tracing, memory analysis, anti-debug bypass, and control flow analysis.

environmentVariables.description: Host where the x64dbg plugin REST API listens
environmentVariables.name: X64DBG_MCP_HOST

environmentVariables.description: Port where the x64dbg plugin REST API listens
environmentVariables.name: X64DBG_MCP_PORT
